Headline: #88 Higgins Temporary Westbound Reroute near Talcott/Oriole
ShortDescription: Westbound #88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Talcott, Oriole and Devon: due to, street blockage near Talcott/Oriole.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Talcott, Oriole, Devon and over regular route , due to street blockage near Talcott/Oriole.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #7 Harrison Reroute near Harrison/Wood
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted Harrison/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Ashland, Polk, Wood, Harrison, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Harrison/Wood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Montrose
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a sick customer.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
